name: Narwhal Ball
description:
A Narwhal and a bunch of rainbow block level designs.  Can you beat all 6 Levels?

Cute and fun, just for kids or someone who wants a challenge!

Rainbow blocks only 1 hit to destroy.
Grey blocks take 3 hits to destroy.
Black blocks can not be destroyed.

Enjoy!

Update *Added a continue button*
Please leave any constructive or positive feedback.
